Reviews.Title: 157 people gave a one star rating for a reason. Don't but it !
Reviews.Author: irv
Reviews.Content: Bought Le Pan on 12/26/11.  After a few weeks the screen would freeze and it would be unable to use.  I then had to ship the unit back and pay for the shipping because Le Pan wouldnt pick up the tab to ship their defective product back to them.  The second unit is now also defective. It wont even turn on. When I wrote to customer service they responded by saying " sorry but your unit is out of warranty ". They didnt say send it back and we will fix it and bill you since it's out of warranty. The unit died on me after one year and one month.  Spend a few bucks more and get another tablet from a better company.

Reviews.Title: OK Device
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: This tablet has a decent battery life and it runs most of the apps in the app store. some would not run because of the type of processor, or because it dosen't have the correct gyro in it. Most apps run well though.The major downfall is the proprietary charging chord. If you loose it, you are screwed, because you just can't go to Wal-Mart and get another one. If you want additional chords, you gotta order them or find them on e-bay.

Reviews.Title: Crashed two weeks after return window
Reviews.Author: Jenn
Reviews.Content: I bought this as an Xmas gift for my daughter early and after less than 2 months of use it has crashed and will not turn on. It seemed like a great option for my teen daughter and now I have wasted $200 plus all the money spent on accessories. The return window closed less than 2 weeks ago. I purchased it for the speed, reactivity, and price. Next time will spend the money on a better device with a more reputable support system.

Reviews.Title: YES.
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: I highly, highly, highly recommend this tablet.This tablet was exactly what I wanted. Big screen touchscreen with flash support and a good amount of storage. It's been about 7 months since I purchased this tablet and it hasn't disappointed me at all. I can watch a movie, check my email, read papers for class, and play my favorite android games for hours all on one charge. Great product!Note: The first tablet I received was damaged. I called Amazon, got the best customer service of my life, and they rushed a second tablet to me (I received it the next day). I still have the 2nd one and it's awesome.

Reviews.Title: Maybe it works... mine did not
Reviews.Author: obh1
Reviews.Content: BUYER BEWARE:  I ordered this brand because it got generally good reviews, but this tablet did not work properly from the the first day.  And maybe I wouldn't mind that if I could get a functioning replacement.  However, Le Pan's Support Department is TOTALLY UNRESPONSIVE.  I wasted probably a total of 3 hours sitting on hold (no answer, only music and a recording saying how important my call was to them), and my e-mail requests for service have gone unanswered.Maybe they've gone out of business and no one told us?

Reviews.Title: Review for TC978 Model;Buyer Beware
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Brokenshire
Reviews.Content: Please note I could not locate the model TC978 on Amazon but it seems it doesn't matter since the problem written below happens to other models of Le Pan. I purchased this LePan (in purple though) on 12.14.12 as a Christmas present. I gave it to my wife and after 19 days (from date of purchase 12/14/12) it would not start despite pushing the reset button and start button as recommended. My wife also charged it overnight as well but it still would not start. I sometimes felt it shake when I pressed the power button. I then exchanged it (despite Walmart's 2 week return policy on tablets; the representative was very nice and understood since it was a Christmas gift I could exchange it). I received the tablet around 1.5.13. Now my wife says it does not start again; screen is black, charging it overnight did not solve the problem and doing all the other things previously done did not help. She called Walmart.com and was able to return it after having it for about 1 month. Beware of this product. I did some research online (I took a risk even though some reviews were low but a lot of good reviews were written as well) and this has happened to many others. My wife contacted LePan prior to contacting Walmart.com and they stated that the tablet needed to be shipped at our cost. She even read a review on Amazon and someone returned it 4 times with shipping cost of $18 per time. She was not going to deal with that and called Walmart in hopes of returning and thank goodness they took it back. Yes, this tablet is a 10 inch and really inexpensive; I paid $130 plus tax. You know the old saying, "You get what you pay for", this saying shines in this situation. We ended up purchasing a Toshiba Excite and yes it costs $200 more but it got rave reviews and hopefully it will not be like the LePan. We emailed LePan and let them know how horrible their product was. You can take a chance and purchase this product but please know that your are taking a risk. Others reviewed this tablet and loved it but to have the tablet break 2 times shows that it is not made well. Please note my wife takes care of things and did not drop it or anything of that sort.

Reviews.Title: Garbage product by a garbage company. Runaway..avoid at all costs.
Reviews.Author: SP
Reviews.Content: I bought this in March 2012 and one month after purchasing, the tablet would not charge. No answer when I called customer service line and the Le Pan website was down. Finally, I got RMA issued in May and I had to pay $20 out of my own pocket to ship piece of s***back. I then waited over a month to get a new one sent back to me. I got the "new" tablet in July but 6 months later, it won't hold a charge again. Almost $300 spent on a coaster. Thinking of getting class-action lawsuit against them as thousands are having the same issue. You are warned.

Reviews.Title: Fairly decent
Reviews.Author: Maria Walker
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift. The recipient says its a fairly decent product for the price, compared to other tablets.

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet with good price, but...........
Reviews.Author: R. Huang
Reviews.Content: Got as a gift for my hubby. It is a nice tablet. But it is pretty slow reading a pdf. file. It shows obvious delay when operating files. Returned to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: inexpensive quality product
Reviews.Author: Mike M
Reviews.Content: Purchased 1 for personal review. Looking for a  tablet that was easy for a group to use together in order to reduce the amount of papers distributed at a meeting.Purchased 10 more units. Costs were 140 dollars per unit and were delivered in less than a week.Purchase through Walmart because of their easy return policy.The power hookup is a little hinky.  Resembles an iPod's---  long thin plug in. But is not interchangeable.

Reviews.Title: A good tablet
Reviews.Author: Amanda Patterson
Reviews.Content: Compared to my ipad and now Kindle Fire, this is definitely at the low end.  Great looking screen and good speed on most programs.  However the touch screen would be a bit buggy and web pages were difficult to manage.  Some would fail completely.  Overall a decent tablet for the price.

Reviews.Title: Very delighted and surprised!
Reviews.Author: Isaiah 55:11
Reviews.Content: Purchased this one for my daughter. Didn't want to buy an overly expensive tablet but wanted to have one that did what she needed for it to do. I must say that so far I am very pleasantly surprised. It connected easily to our network and loads quickly. If this one works out fine, I will be purchasing a few more. So far...very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: aweful!!!
Reviews.Author: sailinron "sailinron"
Reviews.Content: i have returned 2 of these both with problems they dont work have a history of problems thats why the price  thank god for amazon and thier great return policy

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Marie O
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Le Pan II a couple of months ago, and I LOVE IT. It's a great product and does exactly what other more expensive competitors are doing. Plus, it uses Google's Android.... and we know everything from Google is awesome and will more than likely "rule the world".

Reviews.Title: Lepan I Review
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: This model is my first tablet and a I love it.  The battery lasts 6 hours.  It connects to my home wifi without any problems.  I play games review email and listen to radio. There are tons of free apps at the google play store..  The only thing I was unhappy with is you can't easily take photos as the camera is front facing for use with Skype.  I bought the extra sd card but havent needed it yet.  I just bought this same tablet for my husband.  I tried getting him a cheap tablet and it would'nt connect to the wifi.k

Reviews.Title: Dead within one-week of usage
Reviews.Author: Gadgetman
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet from one of the Holiday sales promotions which gave a pretty good deal.I was pretty happy with it for the price and that the display was pretty nice. However, I found that I was not able to install some of my favorite apps including the  Sling player which I use very often to watch my DVR programming on-the-go. After one week of usage, the unit was completely dead and I was not able to power-it on. Tried to contact customers support twice and was put on-hold for more than 15 minutes and never got through. Eventually I returned the unit.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Please Don't Waste Time & Money Like Me!!!!
Reviews.Author: BigWyrm
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet last year for my daughter last year for Christmas. To this date I have had 4 replacements. I currently have a new case open to get my 5th replacement!!!! Customer service is a joke with this company. I have paid almost the same amount in shipping as I did for the tablet. I have had power issues will every single one. Some the power would not turn on, others the power cord(which is cheaply made) would not charge the tablet. I am about to cut my losses and buy her something that is not a waste of money. I promise you that you will be disappointed if you buy this.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed!!!
Reviews.Author: Sonya Bell
Reviews.Content: Even after expanding the memory to a 16gb, with a recommended memory card for tablets, it constantly froze! Every 10 minutes I had to reset it. So disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Caitlin "busy mom"
Reviews.Content: My 6 year old has been begging for an Ipad.  (Yeah right!!!)  So we started looking into tablets and found this one.  He's had it about 6 months and loves it!  He can do youtube, email, facebook, etc.  He has downloaded all the angry birds and other various games.  The flashplayer is great, it doesn't skip or anything.  The only thing that doesn't work is skype.  You can make calls with skype, but it doesn't do video chat, so that was misleading.  There is a camera, but it's on the back of the tablet.  It's also set up just like my android phone so my son took to using it with ease.  I downloaded the kindle app so he can read books.  I've actually borrowed it to read books on it myself!  Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Andrea
Reviews.Author: sandrea
Reviews.Content: I am not a techie  so I got this le pan versus other more sophisticated ones as a trial. the only problem i have is setting up calenders and cameras as I am not familiar with those operations in smart phones or other tablets. i did download the owners manual and that was some what helpful.

Reviews.Title: It was ok
Reviews.Author: soullesly
Reviews.Content: Well i ordered the Le Pan as a present, but when it came it would not turn on. I sent it back and it took a long time for them to replace it and have it shipped back to me. Anyway, the second one i got, I was surprised it worked! But it was a really good tablet, then 3 months later it completely quit on me! I could not replace it so i am not happy with it.

Reviews.Title: needs firmware update
Reviews.Author: K. Hawkins
Reviews.Content: This tablet performs well otherwise, but it freezes like crazy unless you update the firmware.  Go to LePan's website and download the update.

Reviews.Title: lepan
Reviews.Author: mason
Reviews.Content: it arrived and so far works really well. I bought it for my husbands birthday and he's not all touch screen or shall i say digital savvy be he likes it better than the ipad one he was using. I give it a 5stars

Reviews.Title: great tablet great price
Reviews.Author: BTierney
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my husband for valentines day this year and over all he's been satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: A piece of Junk with sorry customer service!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Mike Adams"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is the worst piece of junk I have ever seen. It worked good for the first month or two then the nightmare begin. I had to swap this tablet 4 times and went through heck to get someone on the phone each time. The company has only one line with no voicemail good luck talking to them. I had to call several times just to get to speak to someone.  Their turn around time for exchanges is a painstaking 4 or 5 weeks and would have been longer had I not have called and threaten the with the better business bureau.  When the 4 one crashed I finally rooted the tablet and flashed it with another rom hoping the problems were from bugs in their Android build. Well it worked for awhile and crashed again and the screen started giving strange flashing problems. After several hours upon hours of frustration I finally said I had had enough. I shut the piece of junk down and threw it in a parts drawer because that is all it is worth. Do yourself a huge favor and stay away for this tablet, Far away. I am an IT support tech and have fixed some hard to fix computers and I did not have the patience to put up with this piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the money
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: GREAT FOR WEB BROWSING AND ONLINE GAMES. SLICK!! USER FRIENDLY.AWSOME FOR YOU TUBE.BIG ..S SCREEN FOR AGES 2-99YRS.NICE FOR THE MONEY

Reviews.Title: Nice tab, but too pricey now...
Reviews.Author: J. Helgeson
Reviews.Content: Late 2012 UPDATE:  Looks like the new price isn't coming down anytime soon.  Dropping from four stars to three, because once you get near the $200 price point, there are probably better options...-----Ok, so a couple of weeks back I picked one of these up for a buck thirty, right here.  A few days later, it listed for a buck fifty!  And now, a buck eighty?!  I mean, yeah, the tablet's actually pretty good (for a second-tier FroYo unit), but with its current price volatility, you might want to consider either other models or other vendors.As for specs, this one is a PDF reader's dream.  Well, ok, a 15" borderless unit would be perfect, but realistically, this is quite a solid runner-up, and a bargain (at least at its former price).  Yeah, it'll play video games, but remember, it runs FroYo (Android 2.2), so the OS is old, and I have no inclination to try upgrading it.  Frankly, I don't even see a need to root it.  If you just consider it a giant Kindle with the Google Play store installed, you'll be pleased as punch with it.  With the current incarnation of Adobe's PDF reader app, if you set the page-view to "Continuous," there's no need to reflow anything.Other than the occasional freeze or lockup, which frankly happens to all 2nd-tier units at some time or another, the only real issue I've encountered (and I think this may be the issue in some of the negative reviews here) is that you ABSOLUTELY HAVE TO charge the battery fully before using it.  It comes a bit precharged, and the battery life is great (which probably explains the heaviness), but if you let the power run all the way down, the thing won't power up enough to even start a proper recharge cycle for like an hour.  It's a PITA, but the fix is easy--just don't ever let the battery level drop below ~15%.  And speaking of charging, it takes quite a while, and the socket's proprietary, but rumor has it you can use a standard 15-pin iPod charging cable, if you shave off a bit of plastic from the sides.  I've never tried, but honestly, LePan sells replacement cords for so cheap, why bother?Other things:  Remember, it's running FroYo, so NO EQUALIZER.  (Sux if you're an audiophile.)  Also, it'll fit an iPad case just fine, but the I/O holes and button spaces won't line up, so be prepared to use a scissors on the case if you go this way.So in a nutshell, for a buck-thirty, LePan's TC-970 is a great PDF reader.  At its buck-eighty inflated price, though, you might as well check out some 1st-tier tabs that run 4.0+ (Ice Cream Sandwich, Jellybean, etc.).

Reviews.Title: Cute but slow
Reviews.Author: Lus
Reviews.Content: I like everything about it. Its cute and everything but everything is soo slow, i want to say is my wifi connection but mine is pretty fast..

Reviews.Title: I love my le pan
Reviews.Author: Misty
Reviews.Content: I bought this because of the price, but i couldnt have been more pleasantly surprised. It does everything i need it and want it to do. It is very quick and responsive and the screen quality is great. It is a little heavier than i would like it to be and i have had to reset it once or twice, but for the price i cannot complain. I love this tablet. And i would def recommend it to anyone looking for a nice sized,affordable,durable, well working tablet.

Reviews.Title: BEST FOR THE MONEY
Reviews.Author: Miss Jenn
Reviews.Content: I BOUGTH ONE OF THESE FOR EACH OF MY CHILDREN, THEY ARE COMPLETELY SATIFIED WITH THESE TABLETS, EASY TO DOWNLOAD, SPEED IS GOOD.. I HAVEN'T FOUND ANYTHING I HAVEN'T LIKED ABOUT IT YET, MAYBE THATS WHY I DECIDED TO BUT TWO MORE, 1 FOR MY HUSBAND AND ANOTHER FOR MYSELF... LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the price!
Reviews.Author: pianoman29
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the few functions that I expected to get out of it - namely photo storage, email and Skype. Unfortunately this version (1) doesn't seem to have a powerful enough processor to handle Skype smoothly but in every other respect it does just fine. It's very handy around the house - light and big enough screen to do the job. Most apps are easily configurable including email and even, get this, RDP! No Skype makes it a 4 out of 5 but reliable and fast RDP connection brings it back to a 5 out of 5. I can log into my work PC and take this light little baby instead of a hefty laptop. Battery life is excellent and so is the screen resolution and image.You can't go wrong at this price.

Reviews.Title: I REALLY WANTED TO LIKE THIS TABLET
Reviews.Author: J. Zamora
Reviews.Content: Had it for about 2 weeks more or less. At first , I couldn't do anything. no google market, email, gmail, sync, nothing. Then i did a factory reset. Everything changed. Now I could sync, email, FULL google play store, even text with "haywire", everything I can do with my HTC EVO 4G LTE, this thing does too. Its like a huge phone. Touch screen is pretty good too. Responsive as can be. Then everything fell apart. It froze once. And again. And again. And again. A couple of times a day at first. Then about every half hour in the past two days. Just cant deal with that. Its going back tomorrow

Reviews.Title: excellent value worth every penny
Reviews.Author: lynn
Reviews.Content: My son has the ipad and i bought this for my daugther and my son said its better as u can put more memory onto it as with the ipad u cant. wortyh every penny and has more or less the same features as the ipad

Reviews.Title: Le Pan died on me after 6 months - then "came back to life"
Reviews.Author: Alexei
Reviews.Content: Le Pan died on me after 6 months (looks like voltage supply). Does not react on reset. It was good while it went. Looks like you can not leave it with power ON. Two stars out of 5.Correction: after keeping a Le Pan connected a power for 12 hours, it finally reacted to Reset (and then "came to life"). So I am changing the device from 2 starst to 4 stars. It was scary for a while: device twice got complete dark, no signgs of life for many hours.I always now do a "full" turning off of the device and always keep the battery fully charged.

Reviews.Title: Pure excellence
Reviews.Author: Leola
Reviews.Content: I love the Le Pan! It works great. The internet is fast, even when I have up five different windows. Downloading speeds aren't long and I just love the apps. This was my first and only tablet and I haven't had any regrets. I would highly recommmend this tablet to people looking for a good quality tablet for a reseasonable price.

Reviews.Title: not too great
Reviews.Author: angus
Reviews.Content: this tablet lasted for a couple of months before it shut down and never started up again. not the best brand either. better off investing in a samsung galaxy tab or an ipad.

Reviews.Title: Le Pan is Le Great!
Reviews.Author: Vegas Techy
Reviews.Content: I had to purchase a tablet running Android 2.2 for the purpose of App testing, and after locating and reviewing different tablet brands, dimensions, and features, I selected and purchased this Le Pan tablet.My first impression was very good.  It is an excellent size, features a nice bright screen, decent resolution, and a snappy processor.As a standard application user, I'm not someone who will be using this tablet for more than side uses such as app testing, web surfing, web purchasing, and some gaming, I found this tablet to be, especially for casual use, a very substantial product.ProsQuality look and feelFast processorGood resolutionExcellent soundVery responsiveCons - (Since I SHOULD find something to show I'm not a shill for Le Pan)High gloss screen - Sometimes this is a bit more reflective than I'd like, but that's being picky.

Reviews.Title: I Love This Tablet!
Reviews.Author: L. Sanders "avid reader"
Reviews.Content: I know very little about this level of electronic device compared to many of my friends.  I went online and did some research based primarily on price and then reviews.  This tablet is perfect for me, and based on reviews for a majority of people.  I took it to work and a man I work with said "I really hate to admit this, but this is a nice tablet."  He went and purchased one for himself.  It is easy to use, which is good because the user's manual is very brief and limited.  There are forums to go to that will help and I have used those.  It won't stop you from the minimal things you want to do, however.  I use it when I don't want to carry my laptop.  Picture is clear and colors bright.

Reviews.Title: le pan tc 970
Reviews.Author: Jared
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet online and the only issue ive had was about 3 crashes (which were solved by simply pushing the reset button on the back).

Reviews.Title: May need to reset after a Full Charge!!!
Reviews.Author: Tech. Geek
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome tablet in comparison with the I-Pad... This was a good buy for the price. The only problems you may face is having to reset the tablet with a toothpick or some small tool after charging. It is interchangeable with any 30-pin charger. Video is not that clear, but for the price... hey you will love it.

Reviews.Title: really great for the price, solid quality
Reviews.Author: JibberD
Reviews.Content: Better than expected for $200. It is like my HTC droid incredible but big enough to see webages, photos...I am typing this review with the tablet and do find the keyboard a little tough...too big to use thumbs technique and too small and sensitive to be a standard keyboard. Other complaint is the proprietary 30 pin charger.Quality is amazing for this price. Sturdy, sleek and cool. Want to give 4.5 stars.I researched inexepensive tablets looking to buy my first and got this one based on reviews and price. I am not disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good for the Money!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical of ordering this because of some of the reviews but I am glad I did order this. I would have liked to get the updated one but money wise this was perfect. I ordered this for my husband to replace the tablet he lost. We were not disappointed. We actually like the slim look and feel. The USB part is a little different but it still had were you can connect a port. The colors are rich and clear on the screen. It connects great with my Hotspot on my HTC EVO. It's a good PC Tablet for the money.

Reviews.Title: Le Pan II is a great alternative tablet for the price!!
Reviews.Author: B. Sutton "Graybeerd"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my son as a 15th birthday gift.  I did not want to pay $500 or more for an iPad or Android tablet, and this seemed like a well reviewed alternative.  I think this device is great for someone that is going to use it for entertainment or a laptop alternative focused on web based apps.ProsBattery lasts for hoursGreat screenThinCan be upgraded (someday) to ICSNot running some old 2.x Android sware out of the boxMicroSD availableQuick response time with graphicsNetflix runs like a champConsNo Hulu+ support.... but my opinion of Hulu+ is not very positive anyway :|Found a Targus Truss case for iPad Gen1 that fit just great and the boy is happy as a clam now since he wont need to lug around the old laptop I gave him from years ago.  Smudges and glare... you wont escape that with any of these devices IMHO.  Get an antiglare cover and go cry about something else :)You wont regret it if you are looking for an Android tablet that costs $200 less than the major market players.  Good luck and have fun.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet but?
Reviews.Author: jhbchristopher
Reviews.Content: Originally ordered off Amazon but due to the wait I purchased from Best Buy. Tablet has been great so far have been very impressed; only hardware issue is youtube buffering but that can be fixed by using Dolphin HD browser and setting it to ipad profile, also make sure the Bluetooth is off as they share the same antenna.Now for the "But?" The Lepan site (lepantab.com has been down for 3 days now, you either get redirected to google, unauthorized or page not found,  I would be a little leery about future support, ordering additional unique Lepan power adapters  and  the ICS update is also supposed to be out shortly, hopefully they are only having temporary problems as the tablet has been great. I would give it 5 stars if not for the website issue.Update after some cheecking the website is not down for everyone if your having problems accessing it can be accessed directly by going to [...]

Reviews.Title: uggghhhh!!!!!
Reviews.Author: AJ23
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet and was impressed the first day of use...but 3 days later i just wanted to toss it...it freezes up constantly and stalls way to much..i wasnt even using high performance website..overall the look, size and weight is beautiful but the system performance sucks..but hey you get what you pay for..im getting a refund imediately.

Reviews.Title: hanfam
Reviews.Author: hanfam
Reviews.Content: We purchased this after reading the many positive reviews.  We have found it easy to use.  About the only negative we could say would be that the low pixel camera makes it almost not worth having but other than that we have been very well pleased with its function, look and performace.  I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Nice Affordable Tablet
Reviews.Author: beelzebub
Reviews.Content: UPDATE: After doing the free upgrade to Android ICS (which was relatively easy) I am happy to report that I no longer have wifi issues - it connects fine everywhere.  Also, after checking the "allow plugins" option in FireFox Beta, I no longer have Flash problems either.  Changing the rating to 5*s now.  Hopefully, Le Pan gets more recognition so that there are more accessories out there altho LePanTab.com's store has gotten better.For the price, this tablet cannot be beat.  There are a lot of cheaper tablets out there but this has solid build quality (love the metal accents), sharp responsive screen (not sure if it is Gorilla Glass I have read that it is & some say it isn't), long battery life (over 8 hours) & has all the little extras built in like GPS.It comes with 1 30 pin cord & so far you can only order another thru the company itself.  Altho if you shave down the plastic parts on an Apple cord, it works.The downside of the tablet is that it takes a long time to charge (altho the long battery life negates that).  The buttons are rather small & hard to press on the curved surface but that is to be expected when you want this thing to be thin & light.  The speakers are on the back which can be muffled if laying down or in a case.  It has rebooted itself on me occasionally but the boot time is fairly quick so not that annoying (yet).Flash works just fine when I use the YouTube app but if a video is embedded in a website, it does not work - tried in both the default browser & FireFox.The biggest complaint is the wifi does not always work - altho I suspect it has more to do with the hotspot than the tablet itself (or at least the compatibility of the 2).  In most places, it connects immediately with no problems but when I am at work/school it will not pick up a signal or it will take hours before it does (altho my phone & laptop find it).  If it did this everywhere I would claim it defective but it is only in the same wifi areas so who knows ...This is my 1st Android product so not much to say there but I so far prefer Symbian as it communicates more with you - like letting you see what apps are running & stopping them w/out having to download an app.  Speaking of apps, there are soooo many in the Play Market that it can be overwhelming to pick which one to use.Got the Targus Truss case for the HP TouchPad which fits this perfectly.  Hopefully this brand will become more popular and we will start to see dedicated accessories that fit it without adding bulk/size.In sum, if you are looking for the cheapest tablet that is decent, reliable & all the bells & whistles, this is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: jae6704
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for Easter gifts.  They are easy to use, have great sound, and connect to wifi with out trouble.  The boys that they were bought for are both 7 and they picked up on how to navagate through the diffrent screans with out any issues.  It reminded me a lot of a Droid.

Reviews.Title: Wow, Just wow!
Reviews.Author: harshbarj
Reviews.Content: I had a Velocity Micro Cruz T301 that I used for over a year and thought it was good. It was nothing compare to this. The touch screen is very responsive. Almost no application in the android market will not install on the device, though some designed only for phones don't work as expected. The sound is very loud and does not sound half bad. It is surprisingly thin and light weight for the power it has. If I had to point out a negative I have to say it's the wifi. on the other side of the house from my router I get a very weak signal whereas my laptop shows a very good connection. But for what it is I can work with that.Get it, you will not be disapointed.

Reviews.Title: Fast HD performance!
Reviews.Author: DarthStyne
Reviews.Content: I've had this tablet for two weeks now. So far I love it. The wifi will run at bandwidth of about 9mbs which is way faster than needed to stream HD programming. The battery lasts several days without need for recharging under moderate use. Its rated at 7 hrs of batterylife while watching video. The dual core 1.2 ghz will run any game or app with ease. The reason I only give 4 stars was because lack of accessories. There are very few cases and no protective skins availible at the time of writing this review. There is a possibility of future accessories as LePan tablets are becoming popular.

Reviews.Title: great deal, only one fault found so far
Reviews.Author: N. Jones
Reviews.Content: I have had it for a week and used it heavily. Loaded many apps, surfed, emailed, connected by Bluetooth to an OBD II reader. Only problem so far is the camera doesn't get along with any QR code reader apps. Other than that for my first Android device (Android being just another GUI for LINUX), I am pretty impressed. Both Google Play and Amazon app stores work, and the Amazon store tells you if it is compatible with the LP2 or not.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for the price
Reviews.Author: Pauly
Reviews.Content: Update:This tablet worked great for me for several months . Then for no reason the screen went to black . Even after trying to reset it etc and make sure it was fully charged , it still was stuck with a black screen . Nothing was done to it , and it was simply sitting there being charged when it happened.I could deal with this if I could get some satisfaction from the manufacturer . Have tried calling ( on hold 2 hrs then disconnected then 1 hr and disconnected ) and no response to several emails .In all , good tablet while it lasted , but very poor (if any) customer support . Sadly ,if the company cannot honor it's warranty I will not be buying anything else from them in the future . Will also steer people clear of this one because of lack of support ...............................................................Previous review:Ordered this tablet after spending several weeks comparing a bunch on Amazon.  Got mine the next day after ordering ( payed extra because it was the only day I was going to be around to receive it) .So far I have had only one issue,  and that was the Wi-Fi.  Simple fix was changing my router to WEP from WAP.  That did the trick.Netflix etc run well and anything else I have done via the web has worked with no issues .So far I can say you get your bang for the buck with this.  Has not given me any issues and has been a breeze to set up and use.

Reviews.Title: IPAD KILLER
Reviews.Author: len pan guru
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box it performed flawlessly after studying Ipad 2 closely Le Pan 2 beats by a mile the hd screen is crisp,touch screen response its dead on its louder than the ipad. I download music,videos,pics all market apps and I dont have to pay a dime. i got in two days. It even has gps and its super accurate Ipads you have to buy and pay that service too. Take it from me apple got beat and for 279.99 LE PAN ROCKS

Reviews.Title: Love My LePan
Reviews.Author: Leah K. Russell "Gift Buyer"
Reviews.Content: I love my Le Pan, it is easy to use long battery life and all I can say is I am so glad I bought it. Perfect little tablet for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Everything I was looking for... so far
Reviews.Author: J. D. Reed
Reviews.Content: I finally gave in to the tablet crowd and wanted something familiar.  Since I've been using Android products for a while now, figured this was the way to go.  Delivery took about 6 weeks but I ordered in January during the big rush.  I've been using the Le Pan religiously for the last month and I'm completely sold.It powered up straight out of the box and connected to my Wi-Fi right away.  From the beginning, I've had no issues connecting either at home or on the road.  In fact, connecting at hotels seems quicker and easier than with my laptop.  My last trip was sans computer and I managed just fine. I purchased the Targus Truss Case for the HP that was recommended by another reviewer and have been completely satisfied with it as well.My only complaint so far was video.  I moved three movies to a memory card and only got sound on one of them.  Video playback was fine but sound stopped before the movie started.  This may be more the fault of my player (I'm cheap, I only download the free stuff) so I'm not marking down the Le Pan.Overall a great product so far but I've not had any dealings with customer support.  I honestly hope I don't have to.

Reviews.Title: I <3 my Le Pan II!!!
Reviews.Author: K. S. Corker
Reviews.Content: Tablet worked great right out of the box - what a fun new toy!!!! Battery life is solid, screen is sharp and beautiful. I am anxiously awaiting the update to ICS (Android 4.0), which should make responsiveness just a tad snappier (I notice that scrolling on webpages is slower than on my Galaxy Nexus phone, which has ICS already). For the time being, this is a great tablet!! I got the ezPDF app and am now able to annotate PDFs easily - exactly what I wanted. Great tablet, great value.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Product for Me
Reviews.Author: Giguana0412
Reviews.Content: So I ordered this tablet on March 25 when they were temporarily out of stock. I waited two days and they were back in stock and I received Amazon's email for the estimated delivery date. Anyways I got it four days later and even though I didn't pay for one day shipping Amazon sent it thattnway. Nothing was was physically wrong with it and when turned on it was perfect. It came with a bunch of generic apps already on it and it runs beautifully. I would recommend this tablet  to all of my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Lepan2
Reviews.Author: PLee
Reviews.Content: For its price, no complaint about it. Full Honeycomb experience at less than half the price of all its competitor.Wifi works well, similar performance to my Nook Color.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet but a couple of issues
Reviews.Author: larke2 "larke22"
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice tablet over all. The couple of issues I have with it is the "on and off" button is very small and hard to press. Getting the sd card in and out of the slot is also difficult. The tablet function very well. Screen is very responsive and loads of apps to chose from on the android market.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME..AFFORDABLE TABLET
Reviews.Author: Jennifer M.
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my 11 year old son and he loves it! Its super easy to set up right out of the box and use. Had it up and going in less then 5 minutes. I love that its Android and he loves the market and all the free games. I bought a zip up case for it and he takes it everywhere. I would definitely buy this again and at this price it makes it even better. He wanted an Ipad for awhile now and I just couldn't bring myself to spending that kind of $$ and this was a great compromise ..I didn't spend a ton of $$ and he got a great tablet.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: Basically I came out just looking for something to replace my computer and it's broken wireless. Searched through all the tablets and the Le Pan seemed perfect for me and it was! For the price it is amazing, good browsing speed, excellent screen (while most people look at the kindle fire since it's the same price, the screen is personally too small for me), and so glad it has the android operating system.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful and at a great price.
Reviews.Author: Reginald Rzah
Reviews.Content: This tablet is wonderful! I got it on the 24th of Febuary and waited to use it for a while before posting a review.I love this tablet it does everything I want it to do. I have none of the wifi issues some seem to have. If I have a 3 bar signal or better it is fine for sreaming video on Nexfix or youtube, but the speed is sub par at 2 or less bars of signal.I would like a hdmi cable sooner rather than later, but for it's few problems with cable compatability and updates I think this is a Superb Tablet for $280.It's a budget ipad killer if you ask me.

Reviews.Title: Ultra short review: it's great !
Reviews.Author: Marco Vaca Salvador "Lord Viper"
Reviews.Content: Received the Lepan II recently after about three weeks of waiting.  I gotta say it was well worth the wait:  the tablet ROCKS !  I sincerely don't understand people that say "android sucks" or other similar stuff.  If you want a cool tablet, that can do daily stuff FAST and be lightweight and with a big screen, look no further.  5 stars hands down !

Reviews.Title: Great... when it works.
Reviews.Author: JFR
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our daughter's 8th birthday, despite mixed feelings because of the many negative reviews. It is really affordable, looks great, is easy to use right out of the box. It was fast, responsive, and fun. It even has a camera and pretty good sound, a big plus. Unfortunately, it started to freeze only days after we got it. Sometimes it would turn on; sometimes not. The battery wasn't the problem; it did hold a charge for quite a while. It just randomly froze without warning. Also, we started having lots of connectivity problems (on our home wireless wi-fi, when we had no problems on our other computers). After a few weeks, we finally threw in the towel and returned it to Amazon. We're not going to take a chance on it again; all the negative reviews unfortunately have proven true. We'll get another tablet, maybe the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Worked well for a while
Reviews.Author: H. K. "promorobot"
Reviews.Content: I am updating my review of the LePan TC970.  It worked fine for a while but slowly began to get buggy over time.  Eventually it just stopped working after 2 years. Oh well.  At the time I bought this $198 was a steal of a price for a 10" tablet.  Now you can get a 7" Samsung Tab 3 for $169 that light years beyond the LePan.  By the way, for me, a 10" tablet is way to bulky and unwieldy.  Much happier with the 7" Samsung I now own.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: ChazB
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about buying an off brand tablet with an old Android version 2.2 but am very happy with my purchase.  Most if not all of the apps I use are compatible with the older Android version.  I considered an iPad but the cost was a lot higher and I was concerned about the greater loss if my young children were to break it.  Speed is good.  Be sure you upgrade to the latest firmware before you do anything else or install programs or data.  Also, I suggest you get a 16GB+ class 10 SD card since the stock card is too small and probably a lower class rating.  I would have purchased the Le Pan II but it was on backorder and I didn't want to wait.  I may purchase another Le Pan 1 or 2 because the kids fight over it and I need another.  Netflix streams fine on our house wifi.  The battery life is ok with about 6 hours on a full charge.  A friend asked if it would run Skype.  I don't use Skype but tested it with him.  The standard video Skype doesn't work but there are hacks you can find that are supposed to work.  I got it partially working but gave up when my friend got a laptop instead.  The camera isn't that good and only front facing but I don't use it.Primary uses: Games (Angry Birds, Where's my Water, for the kids), Movies, eReader (Kindle and Google), web browsing (Dolphin), email, children's educational software (story books, math, reading)

Reviews.Title: Great tablet computer at a low cost.
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: I received this Le Pan II tablet computer last week and I love it so far!  It's a truly amazing little computer for less than $300.00.  I found my ipod touch to be too small to use for email, or even to read the news sites, etc., however this Le Pan II is perfect for all of those uses and more.  The email keyboard is very fast and easy to use, and all the free applications, books, news sites, etc. that you can get with this computer are wonderful!  I highly recommend this Le Pan II  tablet computer.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.  Great Value.
Reviews.Author: Jay W
Reviews.Content: This is a nice tablet.  The screen is nice & bright and very responsive.  I used to have a Samsung Galaxy Tab and I sold it after I got this tablet.  This does everything my Galaxy Tab would do for less than half the price.I have never had any issues with it freezing or locking up.  The first thing I did when I received it was to upgrade it to the latest firmware.  I also bought a couple of extra charging cables for it.  You can use an iPad charging cable if you carve away a tiny strip of plastic on them - which is very easy to do.  Aftermarket iPad cables are plentiful and cheap.I was tempted to buy the Le Pan II but it was out of stock.  It probably wouldn't be worth the extra $ for me anyway.  This tablet does everything I want.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: ARMY wife♥
Reviews.Content: Like most everyone else this took a month to get to me, but for the price and the performance so far it was well worth the wait. Wifi only took about 10 mins to set up, only taking this long I believe because of the service provider. Once it connected everything was fine. I tested you tube and had no trouble playing videos. The only issue I ran into was that I couldn't get Pinterest to run on the browser already on the tablet. I downloaded firefox and that didn't work so I tried Skyfire and I've been able to open any site I tried. All in all pretty happy right now.

Reviews.Title: Browsing doesn't work well at all
Reviews.Author: Mr ISP
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet for reading primarily the Financial Times, other publications I now get in paper form and my favorite stock site, Seeking Alpha.  I was lured down the Android path by having a mostly decent experience using an Android Samsung phone for about a year.  Got the LePan II after reading the glowing reviews and have been mostly impressed about how it works.  However, the one site I want to have work, doesn't, namely Seeking Alpha. Going to SA in the Android browser results in a crash  every time.  It freezes in Opera, and loads a blank page in Firefox.  Yet it works on my  Samsung Android phone.  What's the difference?  Samsung vs LePan I can only conclude.  I've had the LePan II for a few days and since we are starting off this badly, I can't just wait for the other sites that don't work either, and god knows what else.  If I get a solution, I'll repost, but for now, I'm not very impressed.Edit 6/30/2012.  I did a recent firmware update and now the browsing works better (in all fairness, trying SA and other sites on public wifi seemed to work just fine, it's something about my network that the LePan doesn't like).  However the battery state, that a few months ago started showing 50% irrespective of charge state, but with the new firmware installed announced that the battery state IC had failed.  I just dealt with it for a few weeks, but the tablet started going into these states that required a reset to get it to start so I contacted LePan support for warrantee service.  They were quick, asking me to to a system reset, then when that didn't work, issuing an RMA immediately.  That was a week ago, and the tablet is with them.  I'll report back on how the service went.

Reviews.Title: Really really wanted to like it, but...
Reviews.Author: DaCoolness
Reviews.Content: First off it took a month to get to me, which was irritating. But that wasn't the issue when it got here. I had ordered one from Walmart a month and a half ago and had the WiFi issue that some other reviews had talked about, so I sent that one back to Walmart and ordered this one from Amazon.  Hoping I couldn't get two lemons, I was anxious to get it because I loved everything about it except for the WiFi issue.  Now that I got the one from Amazon now it still had the WiFi issue, but current reviews displaying a WiFi fix helped for the most part, the speed test results improved, but watching YouTube videos didn't improve so I figured it was just the YouTube app and was gonna keep it.  That was until I tried the GPS and Bluetooth.  I have a Bluetooth keyboard that I got from Amazon that states it works with Android. It paired fine, but only stays connected for a few seconds and disconnects.  The Le Pan 2 I got from Walmart I got to work with the keyboard after a little tinkering, but no such luck yet with this one.  Then the GPS.  The Le Pan 2 from Walmart was able to use the GPS without any other wireless connections.  This one I have now from Amazon only works with some other wireless connection.  I don't get it?  I guess I was just unfortunate and got two lemons like another reviewer mentioned earlier, and now I'll probably be sending this one back as well.  I want to try ordering again, but I'm getting tired of waiting and shipping charges, back and forth!  I really really wanted to like this, because its a great product with what does work on it, but its frustrating when all the features it should have don't work properly.

Reviews.Title: LE PAN
Reviews.Author: DANNO
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THE LE PAN IT WORKS SO GOOD ALL OF YOU GUYS WHO ARE LOOKING FORWARD TO BY ONE THIS IS THE ONE AND ITS A VERY GOOD PRICE.! :)

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRICE BUT HAVING FREEZING PROBLEMS
Reviews.Author: Rosie osie
Reviews.Content: I was eager to receive my tablet but I was only privileged to use it for 1 night before the unit die, did hit the reset button but that didn't help, I will be returning this to Amazon but undecisive if I should even bother getting a new one.. what do you think? reading other reviews it seems this tablet suffers from dying syndrome.

Reviews.Title: love it, freezing all the time that part sucks
Reviews.Author: FANER %
Reviews.Content: I love this product but it Freezes all the time! most of the time you put it on standby it locks up solid and you have to use the reset butten on the back of the tablet. i have made attempts to fix it ive did a factory reset that didn't help. And the next step i did was updating the firmware that was easy but it didn't have any affect at all.i even took how the sd card in attempts that it be bad still notting. trying to contact seller for a wile nowabout tablet- the 1 Gbz prosser is good it can run all the latest apps it has a hard time running big webpages but besides that its good.- the Gps is good too but you will need to load your rout by hand and what i ment by hand you have to use your finger and drag on on the roads you want to drive on before you disconnect from your internet connection. "gps shouldnt really be on a tablet"- boot time is fast it takes three mins or so.- Wifi is really good one of my friends has a ipad and i was picking up more hot spots then he was- if you have a gmail account you can set it up so when you ever connected to a hotspot you it will update your email on the tablet so you can view it off line. "it wont lost html emails offline"- the touch screen is very responsive what the apps i play.ive been useing the tablet for about a week now and it freezing i would say 5 to 6 times a day it gets old..i love the tablet but i wish it could get fixed

Reviews.Title: Le Pan Tablet (the original one, not Le Pan II)
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I received my Le Pan Tablet (not Le Pan II)several days ago. Unfortunately,I spent a great deal of time hitting the reset button. It kept freezing up every few minutes. A certified computer technician examined it. The person experienced the same problem. I had to return the tablet and get a refund. If I didn't have this problem with the tablet, I would have kept it in a heartbeat. Can someone tell me if the Le Pan II Tablet is more reliable than the original one? Thanks.

Reviews.Title: LePan
Reviews.Author: snaps905
Reviews.Content: I really like this table but the only thing bad is that it freezes and you have to push reset button?

Reviews.Title: Le Pans Support is non-existent
Reviews.Author: Beck
Reviews.Content: I just have to say that Le Pans Support Dept does not respond or answer support questions. Basically THEY DO NOT COMMUNICATE. My Le Pan has problems showing vertical blue lines on pictures rotated and displayed potrait vs landscape. I upgraded the software, sent them pictures and then they just dropped me like I was non existent.They need to respond or at least let you know they don't have a solution or will get back to you.NON COMMUNICATION is NOT the answer.

Reviews.Title: Keep Looking!!!
Reviews.Author: DavisCollins
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my boyfriend as his Valentine's gift. He had issues connecting it to the internet. The charger broke and he had to pay for more charging cords, with took weeks to get mailed. The charging unit is a proprietary unit and is touchy and temperamental.  Now it is less than 6 months and the unit is not working at all. One day it just stopped working. It is going to take weeks for the manufacturer to fix it or replace it. Amazon will only cover the unit for 1 month after purchase so there is no other choice but to go through LePan. He loves using it when it is functional. But has had more problems then fun recently. Thought it was a decent unit for the price, but not if after 5 months it stops working. Do your research on these tablets before you purchase. If it seems to good to be true... IT IS!!Since we originally thought this what such a great product for the price my BF bought me the same one for my birthday a few weeks after V-day. Mine would not charge, I eventually contacted Amazon who reimbursed me for the cost of purchasing a new charging cord, and when I contacted LePan they sent me out a new cord. Now after having it for just 5 months my unit is no longer charging I compared the charging port to my BF's and realized a piece has broken off of the charging port. Now I am going to have to contact LePan and request that they repair it or replace it, and I will be without my tablet for at least a month. I think after all this I wish I had just spent the extra money on the Toshiba Thrive.

Reviews.Title: Surprized
Reviews.Author: tobiasrook
Reviews.Content: I wasn't to keen on getting this item yet the price and the fact that i was getting it for my 10 year old i figured what the heck.The only thing I don't like too much is it has low RAM yet it plays Netflix and games with no problem...I want one too.Sorry for not posting great literature just trying to say..great choice, real good product...delivery was fast

Reviews.Title: Technocel case does NOT fit this tablet - CrazyonDigital is perfect fit
Reviews.Author: hlmaz
Reviews.Content: I bought the Technocel case at the recommendation of some reviewers that it would fit the Lepan but it absolutely does not fit it. It's too big and the Lepan would fall out immediately. Even if it did fit I would be concerned that it would fall out if jostled since the tabs that are supposed to hold it don't have any type of catch to hold it in. If anyone has a recommendation for a case that does fit please reply.(I gave 5 stars not for the case but for the Lepan - totally love it)UPDATE: 2/18/12Received my tan Crazyondigital Folio case and it is a perfect fit. It has loops that the corners fit in which keeps it secure and the case itself looks really classy in the brown and has pockets inside for stuff and a pen. It can be used a stand also. Excellent value for the price. CrazyOnDigital Folio Light Brown Leather Case For Apple iPad

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet at a great price
Reviews.Author: keving458
Reviews.Content: ive played with ipads and samsung galaxy tabs and they are all nice but i cant justify the pricetag. this tablet has the same hardware as a nook color (although a faster clockspeed) and that e-reader/tablet is fantastic as well.  I bought an archos 80g2 and it had screen issues and i felt like i was going to snap it in half.  this tablet is 100 times better.  Yes it is only running Froyo but there is a cyanogen mod in the works for this tablet so be patient. I have had to reset it a few times but it is an electronic device and at least the fix is easy. I did have some issue where the screen itself was actually coming up in the corner.  nothing that a little glue couldnt handle.  all is well now.  for those mentioned issues i only gave it 4 stars.  if 4.5 stars was an option i wouldve given it that. Buy this produce especically since the price has gone down with the release of II and III.

Reviews.Title: Best so far
Reviews.Author: hurryinhoosier
Reviews.Content: The le pan is the best tablet you can buy for the cost. I freakin love this thing, does what it says and does it fast! If you are searching for a tablet to get you started in the tablet world, look no further.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!!
Reviews.Author: marc pastore
Reviews.Content: I have owned this product for over a month now and have to say this is great value for the price.  Wifi setup was easy and you have access to full Android Market.  Battery life is excellent.  The only reason I do not give this a 5 star rating is due to infrequent screen freeze.  Reset button resolves this issue.  Not sure if due to product or wifi connection.  I tend to lean to the product since I do not have issue with Apple Ipod on my network.  I just cannot see spending Ipad prices when this product is available.  I hear Le Pan II/III even/will be nicer!!!

Reviews.Title: What a great tablet for the $!
Reviews.Author: C. Smith
Reviews.Content: I have had the Le Pan tablet for nearly a month now, and enjoy using it on the go. I have had no problems, and like the screen appearance , responsiveness, weight, and quality of build. I am glad to have made this choice.

Reviews.Title: lepan is awesome
Reviews.Author: Jesse Strickland "Keboobi"
Reviews.Content: I have had mine for about 2 years and it is as good today as it was on day 1. Just tried to do the amazon trade in for it and let me warn you dont even try it. It is a scam all the way, I had everything for this little baby in the original box, the original plastic shields for the power adapter and usb cable and not a single scratch on the unit. Submitted with Like-new on the status amazon came back and said it was "acceptable" due to heavy scratching. I call scam on that, maybe the person doing the inspection has never seen a brushed aluminum finish. needless to say I am getting my little lepan back. Stay away from amazon trade ins.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Us!
Reviews.Author: ms.nicky
Reviews.Content: I brought this tablet for my seven year old daughter for christmas from geeks.com through amazon. The first one i received kept freezing so, on the very first day it was returned. They immediately sent me out another and we have not had a problem since. My daughter loves it and so do I. She can play all her games, video chat,vox, Facebook , and take pictures. I can check my emails, watch movies, and skype. I have wifi on my phone so she can take it every where we go. We have really enjoyed this tablet and for 199.00 you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Very nice device
Reviews.Author: Maximo E. Agrazal Ricord "Max"
Reviews.Content: I've been using this tablet for a couple of weeks, and I have to say that it is a very good product.A lot of features condensed on one device that is giving a fair competition to other brands which sold theirs at the double of the price of this.If you are searching for a not so expensive tablet, this one will fulfill your needs.Definitely would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet LOVE IT.  It had some freezing but after update works great.  You have toget the update.  It does everything I need.....

Reviews.Title: Le Pan TC 970
Reviews.Author: B. Gregory "time4u"
Reviews.Content: I had this tablet for about 3 weeks now and I love using it.  I find that it is very fast and easy to use. I only find one bad thing that being the tiny on/off button. However,I am now getting used to that. I tried two other tablets in the same price range. I tryed Kindle Fire and the HP Touch Pad. I brought The Le Pan TC 970 because it was the most functional for me. I like to watch movies. With the Kindle Fire I liked eveything about it but I could not get on the internet with it. And the HP Touch Pad was like a mini computer that could not run the apps. I love my Le Pan. But, I have one more gripe about it, It is that The Lepan Company does not make a case/stand for this tablet. I have been looking for a case that would fit my LePan 9.7 inch display. Since Le Pan does not make a case for their tablet. I have researched reviews on the Le Pan and found three cases that were mentioned that would work with the Le Pan 9.7". I brought and tryed them (Targus Truss,Acase HP Touch Pad HQ and Hp Touch Pad Custom Fit). I found that neither of these three cases worked well. They fitted sloppy and did not secure the Le Pan Touch Pad. I purchased a black leather carying case (sold buy eforcity)that fits a 9.7 display.  I had to make simple adjustments with a mat knife. But, I now have the best case on the market at this time for the Le Pan. I returned the three other cases. If you are looking for a case try this one. I am give this tablet 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Updated Review, Problems Already!
Reviews.Author: CaytieB
Reviews.Content: *****Update 1/23/12*****I have now had this table for almost two months I believe? Anyways, I went to turn on my tablet yesterday, and it didn't respond. I figured it was just dead because I do use it a lot, so I put it on the charger. Today, I tried to turn it on, absolutely no response. Tried to reset it: nothing. I am very disappointed in this tablet. I liked it, but there is no excuse for it not working already. I have not dropped it, and always keep it in it's case. Sending it in asap. Hopefully it'll be resolved soon.I got this tablet about a month ago and so far, I love it. There are a few minor issues with it, though.1. The tablet runs on the Adroid 2.2 OS, and from doing some research, I have learned it will not be able to be updated to the 2.3. Minor issue, but one worth noting.2. I've noticed that sometimes, I have to tap an app a few times or harder than normal to get it to open. I'm not sure if it's just me, but I feel the sensitivity should be a little better.3. It's pretty hard to get cases for this tablet because it is an "off brand." I bought a leather case for it thinking it would work, and although it was the correct size, I could not get to the home buttons when the tablet was in the case.4. The camera is only on the front. Which is great to use it as a webcam, but not so great if you want to take pictures of something other than yourself.Other than that, the tablet is great. Easy to use. It seems very well made to me, and worth the money.Works as well as more expensive tablets. Picture is good, and sound quality is also very good.Over all, definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Easily completes with $400-$500 tablets
Reviews.Author: Andi
Reviews.Content: I bought my mom one of these for Christmas. She's been using an Ipod touch but her eyesight is going so I got her something with a larger screen. I've been teaching her how to use this and I am very impressed.The tablet has a solid build, doesn't feel cheap at all. Seems like the body will last a long time. Screen is responsive. We don't do anything fancy or use the multitouch features but it always interprets zooming correctly. The only thing that has lagged are youtube videos but I couldn't say whether it was buffering the wifi connection or the processor wasn't going fast enough. We don't do anything real hardcore with it but we have played movies, music, tv shows, games, done websurfing and read books but it hasn't show any lag on anything but youtube. The speakers on it are quite impressive. I hear it will get the upgrade to ICS but haven't been able to confirm that yet.The amount of memory that comes with it is a joke but a 16gb microSD card on amazon was less then $20 and a 32GB is less than 40 so that's not a big deal. The lack of ports is the only reason I didn't get one of these for myself. There's no USB or microUSB port. There are not many accessories for it. We are having trouble finding a case since most tablets are 10.1" not 9.7" and I haven't seen a case made specifically for this tablet.In general, this tablet competes with the big boys. It isn't the lightest or the thinnest, it doesn't have tons of ports and features, but it works and it works well at half the price. I heartily recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Fare buy
Reviews.Author: Frax
Reviews.Content: The tablet is good in general, sleek design, except for the power button which is placed on the corner in a way it will be pressed buy your hand manytimes before you learn how to be careful all the time.It is a heavy to be hold in your hand if you are laying on your back.The glossy shinning screen needs to be cleaned very often from finger prints, and its hard to avoid the glare if lights or windws are around. Needs antiglare screen protector(add to cost.Need to be careful with It is sad that technically it is not upgradeable to anything OS beyond Android 2.2, but thousands of applications are available for 2.2. that was not clear at the ordering time.ROM upgrade is available on the vendor's website, upgraded easily.You need to upgrade the memory immediately to16GB or 32GB (add its cost) as it comes with 2GB card that you will discard (loss). Unless you don't use heavy content ( videos, images, audio files).So it is a fare buy, as i think tablets should be in the $100 range in the near future. It is a gadget that will be used for 1-2 years.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Although I didn't buy this on here I wanted to leave a review.I just received this today and so far I love it!! I have an I pad 2 but also wanted an android tablet!! This is very similar to my I pad for 1/2 the price! This android is amazing and I highly recommend it! I only wish they had more accessories available to buy for it, hopefully they will soon.You will not be disappointed! The perfect case for this is the CaseCrown Hard Case (Black) for ipad2, just received it and its fits perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: The tablet is great for the most part. It has frozen twice but came back to life by hitting the factory reset button. The touch screen is not quite all there sensitivity-wise. The keyboard is the worst part because it's difficult to use and I don't think it's my fingers. I just don't feel it's as accurate as it could be and a little frustrating. This seems harsh but I still give this tablet 4 stars because most things "wrong" about it are forgivable and minor especially given the ridiculously cheap price point.

Reviews.Title: case recommended does not fit
Reviews.Author: technically challenged
Reviews.Content: The leather case with key board that is recommended as the bundle package does not fit the le pan tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: avantnoise
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 Kindle Fires which both me and my wife love. But I did want to use a larger tablet when I am not on the go and also a full fledged Android tablet. Is this tablet perfect no, but it runs every app I love and then some and does it with a beautiful 9.7 screen for the price of $198. I will certainly be getting an upgraded model of the Le Pan soon. On occasion I had to reset the device but not anymore then my Droid phone. I love reading comic books on this thing and using the Kindle app. The screen looks down right awesome. I am glad I took a chance on a lesser known tablet. I would have given it 4 stars but at this price point I had to go with 5.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift for our 13 year old son - Very satifisied
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: Our son was very surprised when he opened this gift as he was asking for an IPod. He uses it all the time, loves it and has downloaded many apps and music. His mother and myself are also thinking of buying ourselves one as well..Very happy!

Reviews.Title: Amazing device.
Reviews.Author: JohnA2u
Reviews.Content: Ok, just received my Le Pan II. I have had a Le Pan "I" for about a month so I can make some comparisons. The case is identical except I think they redesigned the power button so it is not so easy to accidently hit it. Hd video- On the Le Pan I, I was unable to watch some HD Music videos. They would freeze after 30 seconds to a minute or just get unwatchably choppy. The II played them instantly and smoothly. Youtube plays in hd without having to go the "dolphin browser Connect as Ipad route"Wi Fi connected without any problem. I do not have an "N" router so My connection speed right now is 54mbps. As far as HDMI output, I am not sure how that is accomplished. The supplied cable is the same as the I. There are no instructions in the quick start guide regarding that and no connectors available on the Le Pan site. They say it will do it but I can't confirm that right now. Per Le pan Hdmi out can be achieved with a 30pin to hdmi adapter .I am at work right now and I need to let this baby charge up, so I will be exploring it more tonight. So far I think it fixes all the little frustrations we have all had with the le pan I. Time will tell.I have had a little more time to play with it and I must say it is awesome. The only downside I can see at this time is it does not get as loud as the Le Pan I for some reason. That is a bit disappointing. The browser in honeycomb is really nice has tabs like dolphin and  google chrome.

Reviews.Title: I'M SO VERRRRY DISAPPOINTED
Reviews.Author: S. Thomas "zachsmom"
Reviews.Content: This one worked well at first and then nothing. I can't even get in touch with customer service. Their message keeps looping and they never pick up.

Reviews.Title: GREAT Buy!
Reviews.Author: Germond "Skier"
Reviews.Content: I've had this tablet for a week now and am very pleased with it. It does everything that I need it to do. I would recommend it to anyone. As I said in the title of this review, it is a GREAT buy. You couldn't expect more for the selling price.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Andy Hoo
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 13 yr old son for Xmas. Was out of stock when I purchased but got notice in couple days and shipped/arrived on time. Setting up wireless was pretty straightforward and tablet was ready to use when my son opened it up. Has worked great for him in 3 weeks he has been using it. Plays lots of games, watches youtube and Netflix, and downloads ebooks from library. Also has been taking video and still photos . . . I have not been that impressed by photo quality of 2Mb camera but not that bad either. The power jack is little clunky/appears fragile and I am afraid that might be first point of failure but time will tell. Those two items kept me from giving 5 stars but otherwise this is great Droid tablet so far.

Reviews.Title: Le Pan TC 970
Reviews.Author: Phil
Reviews.Content: I read several reviews of the Le Pan TC 970 tablet before ordering.  Even with some of the drawbacks noted I thought for the price, this would be a good product for what I want to do with a tablet.  After receiving I was more that satisfied with it.  It works great with email, has a great browser and is easy to copy files and pictures to from my mac.  I was even able to import my phone contact list to it.  As in other reviews, the OS was designed for a phone but works fine for me.  Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: FloridaJim
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my young daughter.  She absolutely loves the tablet.  We had the opportunity to take the Ipad II home from school during Christmas break.  It was used every day until Christmas day by all in the family.  After Christmas day, everyone was clamoring for the Le Pan and the Ipad went unused until it was taken back to school.  The Le Pan's screen was chrisper and touch controls more fluid.  The Ipad seemed glitchy and did not respond as well to touch.We were initially worried about the apps for the Android tablet.  After getting on the Android Marketplace site, those fears were put to rest.  There are a ton of free and pay applications for the system.Though it was purchased for my daughter, my wife is using it more and more.  She asked about getting one for herself.  It's really that nice.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad!!
Reviews.Author: Shoun Matlock
Reviews.Content: It works rather well. It just will not play all facebook games, tried to play Bubble Witch Saga and it will not load. I can surf the net and go to any site, watch YouTube videos or whatever. It does far more than the Ipad 1 that I have. It is light weight and very thin, I believe if I dropped it it would break. Overall it is well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: SJH
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a friend. I have a WOPAD I8 that was great until I played with this one - really like it much more! screen is awesomely clear, very fast response, perfect size! Got the Targus Truss case (made for HP touchpad) that fits perfectly! Now I am jealous and want one of these myself!! Waiting for the Le Pan II to trade my in for a new one.

Reviews.Title: Meets the need
Reviews.Author: Don Mesa Arizona
Reviews.Content: I fly every second weekend in and out of Phoenix on a 3 hour flight each way and rather than lug one of my laptops I bought the La Pan to watch movies on. For $2 on Amazon I bought a program and down loaded it and the movies on a card and it works well. The battery after running for about 2 1/2 hours shows 60% left so I assume it would be good for about 7 hours.The Wife wanted to try it so I ended up buying her one also. She likes to read books on her Kindle and the Le Pan comes already loaded with Kindle software which is one use she is using it for. So far only a couple of issues with hers and none with mine.She has had a problem logging on the internet even when she is sitting in my office where the router is so it isn't a signal strength issue. She has also had it shut off when she is using it and finds some times when reading a book the page turn is not working right.There were some complaints over the on and off button but we don't have a problem with it, it is easy to use.I only gave it four stars not because it is bad but you get what you pay for so it isn't a Samsung or Apple but dollar for dollar it would be a six star in the applications I use it for. If I had a any issue with it, it would be that there isn't a microphone so using something like Skype is not a option.

Reviews.Title: brqvw Chicago
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: There is'nt much left to say about this product that has not been said. Now I got that out of the way I own this tablet for about three week now and I'll say it meet all my expectation. I'm new to the tablet world but it was very easy to set up.  For the money you can not go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Love my new tabby
Reviews.Author: Linette97
Reviews.Content: Affordable and well worth it. Netflix works great! why spend $600 on a ipad? this tablet is like having my G2X Tmobile phone in a larger version.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: I am a tablet newbie, but wanted to just add my two cents.  I agree with others here about not comparing it to the ipad....I have an iphone and an itouch, and while I won't spend $500 plus for an ipad, I've played around with it alot. For my needs, which is reading and some internet surfing, getting email, this is a great tablet.  I think well worth the $200 I spent and I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Idovino Artifon
Reviews.Content: This Christmas I purchase one le pan  tc 97 9.70and another android from China Mica oneI have both and there no comparison the le pan is excellent bright colors is just like the other reviews one excellent tablet I recommend and I also want to emphasize do not order from China you will have the hardest time you your life to return or fix a problem. I lost my money.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: walkwithus
Reviews.Content: I love my lepan tablet. I got it for xmas as a gift for myself. I have had some minor issues bcuz i am very new to this. But all in all a great tablet. The apps are great. I have transferred my files easily. You do have to play with it awhile to learn it. It has way more functions than the specs reported you just have to play around with it.  You can email from all your accounts. My new favorite thing is that i can wifi print using  Google cloud print. Download google cloud print to your pc and download the cloud print app from the market its free. Your printer doesnt need to be cloud print ready but it does need to be wifi.The user manual is installed jus press the help icon. Also charge the battery completely at fitst use.I'm still working on video chat.  I can hear and see the other person they can hear me but they cant see me and i cant see myself.As far as freezing it will at times especially if you are pressing buttons like crazy you got to give it time to complete the one function before you ask it to do another and some large apps you may install might have an effect on it freezing as well.I think its a great tablet everyone i show it too is now purchasing one. You do need a screen protector and a good case.I have a folio case for 10.1 size tablets by Caselogic and it works great and i can access the function buttons. I also purchased a speaker dock for ipads and ipods and it works great. I downloaded officesuite pro for creating documents and it includes excel and powerpoint. I just dont know much abt the latter two so still figuring it out so i can print the documents i create via the cloud. If anyone knows let me know. Otherwise everyday i learn a new use for it. Buy it.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: H4Ranch
Reviews.Content: So far so Great!  This tablet has been very impressive in all ways.  I have already recommended it to family and friends.  The speed, clarity and quality will make you wonder why someone would buy a higher priced $$$ tablet.

Reviews.Title: Le Pan 970
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Le Pan 970 Tablet is really great. I don't see what IPAD could do that Le Pan can't. The display has the same resolution and the sound is quite reasonable. The few apps I've tried work fine. If you like Androids Le Pan is definitely a very good deal. Of course the 2 Gb disk is a bit on the low side but it can be easily and cheaply upgraded.The real question is what is a tablet like that (or an IPAD) good for? I am still trying to find an answer, but it is definitely not a PC.

Reviews.Title: Great Product for a Great Price
Reviews.Author: ozzgood
Reviews.Content: I got this for my husband for Christmas, since we don't have the money for an IPad or any of those pricier type products. He likes to play games and surf the internet, so I thought this might fit the bill. It has done just what we want and more. It actually takes a fairly good picture from the camera, though we haven't tried to skype or anything. The android market has worked well and  though some apps haven't been compatible with it, he's found many he likes. The size and picture quality are great. He's really enjoying it and I feel like I made a good choice for his gift!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love these tablets!
Reviews.Author: C. Wunderlich "Proud Mom of 7 yr old!"
Reviews.Content: We puchased one of these tablets for each of our six children for Christmas - ages 13 to 29.  They opened them Christmas Eve and every tablet worked perfectly out of the box.  All of them connected to our internet in a matter of seconds and they were all up and running. I just can't say enough great things about them!!  Plan on buying two more - one for my husband and one for myself (keep using my daughters and just don't want to give it back) - love it!

Reviews.Title: happy camper
Reviews.Author: miriam
Reviews.Content: I was really happy with the quality. The shipping was super fast.would buy again.my kids are enjoying the tablet specially with android market.
